mapper.select:
select
from ON_BUSIN_CHANCE where 1=1
and providerid=#{providerid}
and title like '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'

select count(1) from on_busin_chance a where a.states='0' and a.providerid=#{providerid} and ((a.checked='0' and a.operstate !='0') or a.checked='1' or (a.checked='2' and a.operstate='1')) and a.enddate>=to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select
from on_busin_chance a where a.states='0' and a.providerid=#{providerid} and a.showstate = '1' and a.serviceflag is null and (isundershelf='0' or isundershelf is null) and ((a.checked='0' and a.operstate !='0') or a.checked='1' or (a.checked='2' and a.operstate='1')) and a.sorttag='0' and a.enddate>=to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select
from on_busin_chance a where a.states='0' and a.providerid=#{providerid} and a.showstate = '1' and a.serviceflag is null and (isundershelf='0' or isundershelf is null) and ((a.checked='0' and a.operstate !='0') or a.checked='1' or (a.checked='2' and a.operstate='1')) and a.sorttag='0' and a.enddate < to_date(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.checked='1'
select count(1) from sys_area sa where sa.areacode = #{areaId} and sa.busin_sumlimit = '1'
